data.title: Zorro's Black Whip
data.meta_description: After her vigilante brother is killed by thugs over Idahoâs statehood bid, Linda Sterling assumes his alter ego to carry out his unfinished business.
data.text:
EPISODE 1

The Masked Avenger

Hammond, owner of the town's stagecoach line and a leading citizen, is opposed to Idaho becoming a state, and kills Randolph Meredith, owner of the town's newspaper, for endorsing it.

23 min Â· Jan 1, 1944 TV-PG

EPISODE 2

Tomb of Terror

Hammond, owner of the town's stagecoach line and a leading citizen, is opposed to Idaho becoming a state, and kills Randolph Meredith, owner of the town's newspaper, for endorsing it.

Hammond, owner of the town's stagecoach line and a leading citizen, is opposed to Idaho becoming a state, and kills Randolph Meredith, owner of the town's newspaper, for endorsing it.

Hammond, owner of the town's stagecoach line and a leading citizen, is opposed to Idaho becoming a state, and kills Randolph Meredith, owner of the town's newspaper, for endorsing it.

14 min Â· Jan 1, 1944 TV-PG

EPISODE 5

Hammond, owner of the town's stagecoach line and a leading citizen, is opposed to Idaho becoming a state, and kills Randolph Meredith, owner of the town's newspaper, for endorsing it.
